member.name: T:Microsoft.Testing.Platform.MSBuild.MSBuildCompatibilityHelper
member.summary: This class wraps APIs of MSBuild that are newer than the oldest supported .NET SDK. Our task can get loaded into .NET 6 SDK and we need to guard the usage of these newer APIs.
